name: 廖天豪
objective:
此課程提供對衛星遙測技術及其廣泛應用的全面概覽以及技術實習，課程內容包含衛星遙測導論、數據處理技術、衛星遙測的應用、新興技術與趨勢介紹、以及相關基礎實驗等。學生可獲得衛星遙測技術和方法論的基礎知識，以及開發處理和分析衛星影像的基礎實踐技能。
This course provides an overview and technical practicum on satellite remote sensing technology and its applications, including an introduction to satellite remote sensing, data processing techniques, applications of satellite remote sensing, an introduction to emerging technologies and trends, as well as fundamental experiments related to the field. Students will acquire foundational knowledge in satellite remote sensing technology and methodologies, along with basic practical skills in processing and analyzing satellite imagery.
schedule:
第 1 週：課程介紹及衛星遙測的基本概念
第 2 週：衛星遙測的歷史背景與基本原理
第 3 週：衛星遙測數據的獲取和存儲
第 4 週：衛星影像的預處理方法
第 5 週：衛星遙測在氣象與氣候變化中的應用
第 6 週：衛星遙測在農業監測與土地利用中的應用
第 7 週：衛星遙測在生態環境監測中的應用
第 8 週：衛星遙測在災害監測與管理中的應用
第 9 週：期中考
第 10 週：高光譜遙測及無人機遙測技術
第 11 週：衛星影像獲取與處理實驗
第 12 週：衛星遙測數據的基本分析與解譯
第 13 週：衛星遙測應用實驗（氣象、農業、災害等）
第 14 週：衛星影像的多光譜和高光譜處理實驗
第 15 週：衛星遙測數據的綜合應用案例分析
第 16 週：學生準備實習報告，彙整實習成果和所學經驗
第 17 週：課程回顧與總結
第 18 週：期末報告

Week 1: Course Introduction and Basic Concepts of Satellite Remote Sensing
Week 2: Historical Background and Basic Principles of Satellite Remote Sensing
Week 3: Acquisition and Storage of Satellite Remote Sensing Data
Week 4: Preprocessing Methods for Satellite Imagery
Week 5: Applications of Satellite Remote Sensing in Meteorology and Climate Change
Week 6: Applications of Satellite Remote Sensing in Agricultural Monitoring and Land Use
Week 7: Applications of Satellite Remote Sensing in Ecological Environment Monitoring
Week 8: Applications of Satellite Remote Sensing in Disaster Monitoring and Management
Week 9: Midterm Exam
Week 10: Hyperspectral Remote Sensing and UAV Remote Sensing Technologies
Week 11: Experiment on Acquisition and Processing of Satellite Imagery
Week 12: Basic Analysis and Interpretation of Satellite Remote Sensing Data
Week 13: Applied Experiments in Satellite Remote Sensing (Meteorology, Agriculture, Disasters, etc.)
Week 14: Multispectral and Hyperspectral Processing Experiments for Satellite Imagery
Week 15: Comprehensive Case Studies on the Application of Satellite Remote Sensing Data
Week 16: Student Project Design and Implementation
Week 17: Course Review and Summary
Week 18: Final Report
